message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product. It is truly exceptional and I believe it will bring immense value to your endeavors. Given its worth to us, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $900000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your proposal, we would like to counter by offering the product at $925000.
I understand Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $910000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of our product and your interest, we would like to counter with an offer of $930000.
Alice, thank you for your continued efforts. I would like to counter with an offer of $920000.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, we would like to counter with an offer of $935000 for our product.
Alice, I appreciate your offers. I would like to counter with an offer of $925000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, we would like to counter with an offer of $940000.
Alice, thank you for your persistence. I would like to counter with an offer of $930000.
